about.title: About Me
about.intro: Hi! I'm Adri√°n Escribano, a Full Stack developer with a strong passion for technology, open source and innovation. I specialize in building robust, scalable and visually appealing digital products, taking care of every detail from backend architecture to frontend user experience.
about.stack: I enjoy learning new technologies, solving complex challenges and collaborating in multidisciplinary teams. My main stack includes JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Next.js, Node.js, PHP, Java, C, Bash and MySQL, but I'm always open to exploring new tools and languages.
about.extra: Besides coding, I'm motivated by sports, music, tech outreach and contributing to the open source community. I believe in continuous improvement, transparent communication and the positive impact of technology on society.
about.cta: If you're looking for someone committed, resourceful, creative and eager to grow, don't hesitate to contact me! Always open to new challenges, projects and collaborations.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: A selection of projects that showcase my Full Stack experience, from modern web apps to low-level systems.

PowerFuel.description: Complete e-commerce platform with advanced product management and payment gateways.
PowerFuel.detailed_description: PowerFuel is an e-commerce web application built with modern technologies. It includes real-time inventory management, integration with multiple payment gateways, user authentication system, full admin panel and SEO optimization. It uses MySQL as a relational database to ensure referential integrity and optimal transactional performance.
PowerFuel.badge: E-commerce with MySQL ‚Ä¢ Integrated payment gateways

GymGO.description: Cross-platform app for comprehensive gym management with web, mobile and desktop versions.
GymGO.detailed_description: GymGO is a full ecosystem for gym management including: robust backend with RESTful API, native mobile app with React Native/Expo, and desktop application in C. It offers membership management, workout tracking, reservation system and real-time analytics.

Minishell.description: Full implementation of a Unix-like shell in C following POSIX standards.
Minishell.detailed_description: Minishell is a reimplementation of bash written in C that handles builtin and external commands, pipes, redirections, environment variables, globbing and signals. Project developed at 42 Madrid following coding standards and best practices.

Portfolio Profesional.description: Personal portfolio built with Next.js showcasing projects and technical skills.
Portfolio Profesional.detailed_description: Modern responsive personal portfolio built with Next.js and TailwindCSS. Includes Framer Motion animations, SEO optimization, dark/light mode, dynamic projects section and working contact form. Deployed on Vercel with analytics integration.

Presets UI.description: Reusable component library for React and Angular with interactive documentation.
Presets UI.detailed_description: Collection of pre-designed and highly customizable UI components to speed up frontend development. Includes React components with TailwindCSS and Angular components with Bootstrap, interactive docs, live playground and theme system.
